item.title: Colors of Twitter
item.description: Basically by combining Twitter feed data (100 million tweets and counting) with a language detector (together with some geometric post-processing, and lots of hours of coding), I was able to offer a quite detailed look at the language geography of the Twitter universe. By generating GeoJSON I can display the data in an interactive map: And PNG output can also be useful to easily share highlights about specific regions:
